speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Szejna on behalf of the Committee on Legal Affairs on recent developments and prospects in relation to company law [ 2006/2051(INI) ] ( A6-0229/2006 ).

agenda_item: Recent developments in and prospects for company law (debate)
